description: Primes p such that 30*p+1 is also prime.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
example: A002110(3)*p+1 and p are primes.p=19 is in the sequence because also 30*p+1=571 is prime.
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(900) | IsPrime(30*p+1)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 11 2013
author: _Labos Elemer_
